trans-unit.source: A @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature' is responsible for drawing a given type of @'Stride.Rendering.RenderObject'.
trans-unit.target: A @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature' is responsible for drawing a given type of @'Stride.Rendering.RenderObject'.

trans-unit.source: The collect phase determines what needs to be processed and rendered. It's usually driven by the graphics compositor.
trans-unit.target: The collect phase determines what needs to be processed and rendered. It's usually driven by the graphics compositor.

trans-unit.source: creates render views, and updating them with the most recent data such as view and projection matrices
trans-unit.target: creates render views, and updating them with the most recent data such as view and projection matrices

trans-unit.source: creates and setting up render stages
trans-unit.target: creates and setting up render stages

trans-unit.source: The extract phase copies data from game states of previously collected objects to short-lived render-specific structures. It's usually driven by the @'Stride.Rendering.RenderSystem' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature's.
trans-unit.target: The extract phase copies data from game states of previously collected objects to short-lived render-specific structures. It's usually driven by the @'Stride.Rendering.RenderSystem' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature's.

trans-unit.source: This should be as fast as possible and avoid heavy computations since game update and scripts are blocked. Heavy computations should be deferred to Prepare.
trans-unit.target: This should be as fast as possible and avoid heavy computations since game update and scripts are blocked. Heavy computations should be deferred to Prepare.

trans-unit.source: !Note Currently, Stride doesn't parallelize game updates and scripts, so they won't be resumed until the prepare and draw phases are finished.
trans-unit.target: !Note Currently, Stride doesn't parallelize game updates and scripts, so they won't be resumed until the prepare and draw phases are finished.

trans-unit.source: The prepare phase prepares GPU resources and performs heavy computations. This is usually driven by the @'Stride.Rendering.RenderSystem' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature's.
trans-unit.target: The prepare phase prepares GPU resources and performs heavy computations. This is usually driven by the @'Stride.Rendering.RenderSystem' and @'Stride.Rendering.RenderFeature's.

trans-unit.source: filling constant buffers and resource tables
trans-unit.target: filling constant buffers and resource tables

trans-unit.source: The draw phase fills the GPU command list.
trans-unit.target: The draw phase fills the GPU command list.

trans-unit.source: drawing combinations of render stage with render view.
trans-unit.target: drawing combinations of render stage with render view.

trans-unit.source: A typical example of views and stages created during collect phase, used during the draw phase:
trans-unit.target: A typical example of views and stages created during collect phase, used during the draw phase:

trans-unit.source: Pipeline processors are classes called when creating the pipeline state. This lets you do things such as enable alpha blending or wireframe rendering in a specific render stage.
trans-unit.target: Pipeline processors are classes called when creating the pipeline state. This lets you do things such as enable alpha blending or wireframe rendering in a specific render stage.

trans-unit.source: Stride includes several predefined pipeline processors. You can also create your own.
trans-unit.target: Stride includes several predefined pipeline processors. You can also create your own.
